name: Conru2
description:
Controls:

  • W - Move -Z
  • A - Move -X
  • S - Move +Z
  • D - Move +X
  • Space - Jump
  • G - Toggle BuildMode
  • R - Reset Player
  • R+Shift - Reset Layout  
  • H - Hide/Show GUI
  • Shift + H - Hide/Show Debug Text

Controls in BuildMode:

  • W - Move -Z
  • A - Move -X
  • S - Move +Z
  • D - Move +X
  • Z - Move +Y
  • X - Move -Y
  • Space - Destroy/Place Block

Was made in Construct 2
